com.model

Interface UserDao

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    UserDaoImpl

    public interface UserDao
    UserDao is a class that represent a user model. It's a group of method for users. In this class we define all the method needed without implementing them.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    team MyVegetable
